content.heroIntro: Welcome to VILLAS NATURE, an exceptional residential development by NATUR VILLAS LEVANTE located in the charming coastal town of San Juan de los Terreros, Almería. This premium villa project offers the perfect blend of modern living and Mediterranean lifestyle, featuring 5 exquisite properties designed for families and investors seeking quality and value. Each villa in VILLAS NATURE showcases contemporary architecture with 3 bedrooms, 2-3 bathrooms, and built sizes ranging from 110-125m², set on generous plots of 240-258m². With prices starting from just €356,500, VILLAS NATURE represents outstanding value compared to properties in other Spanish coastal markets, positioned 40% below comparable island developments. The project is strategically positioned near pristine Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, and all essential amenities. NATUR VILLAS LEVANTE brings years of expertise in developing quality homes in this thriving community, with completion scheduled for September 1st, 2025. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or investment opportunity in one of Spain's most welcoming international communities, VILLAS NATURE offers the perfect solution.

locationSection.intro: San Juan de los Terreros is a picturesque Mediterranean coastal village in the province of Almería, situated between the popular resort areas of the Costa Blanca and Costa de Almería. This established expat-friendly destination has evolved into a vibrant community offering the perfect balance between peaceful seaside living and modern convenience. The area attracts international buyers seeking authentic Spanish coastal living without the overdevelopment of major tourist hotspots. With an established English-speaking community, excellent healthcare facilities, and easy access to world-class amenities, San Juan de los Terreros has become increasingly popular for both permanent residents and holiday home investors. The property market here shows strong growth trends at +8% year-on-year, making it an intelligent investment destination. The village offers a relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere while maintaining proximity to major services, making it ideal for families, retirees, and professionals seeking work-life balance.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain and at VILLAS NATURE?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain, including at VILLAS NATURE. You do not need to be a Spanish citizen or resident. The process requires a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and is straightforward with professional legal support. Most international buyers at VILLAS NATURE work with English-speaking solicitors familiar with non-resident purchases.

For non-residents, additional considerations may apply. We recommend consulting with a Spanish property lawyer to understand all costs related to your specific purchase at VILLAS NATURE.
